title: Belarge
author: Belarge
content: What if we wey be citizens for Nigeria wey no get this new currency, what if we decide between ourselves and continue accepting the old currency, e for good for us na.Because if una check am well na we dey reject our money( the old currency) and na we e dey affect pass, What if we decide to use the old currency just within us, e no go better for us?My people how una see am?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: If we decide to accept the currency within us, then the money come plenty 4 person hand, person come need buy something 4rm anoda place way require to pay with transfer, u carry the old money way u dy accept go bank to go deposit am bank no com gree take am, that time the money never waste ??

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: That is right but you have to know what you are doing for that collection of the old note,in the other hand making the old note comfortable within ourselves is really not a good idea in the sense that what if they stop using it and you have alot of it in your hand what are you going to do then.Remember in life what is right also have it wrong side and what is wrong also have it's right side of too. So think wisely before making any step of yours.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: We deciding to accept note within our self is very risky thing to do  because of the new policy which is set outside by the CBN and it's careful watch on all the major Banks. If you are accepting the old note and you are opportuned to deposit it into your bank account it can only be done ones and after that you won't be allowed to deposit another old note using your account again, what will happen to the ones that you will hold after then.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Quote from: Belarge on February 18, 2023, 03:59:45 PMWhat if we wey be citizens for Nigeria wey no get this new currency, what if we decide between ourselves and continue accepting the old currency, e for good for us na.Because if una check am well na we dey reject our money( the old currency) and na we e dey affect pass, What if we decide to use the old currency just within us, e no go better for us?My people how una see am?This is rubbish,the old currency is no longer a legal tender in Nigeria and if you choose to still be using it within yourselves, I see it as a waste of time  and act of ignorance that will lead to great lost,due to your own selfish reason. Big man, you no be CBN and no get any right to go against government law to avoid u causing depression or problem to yourself. Change is constant in life,therefore, make we let old things pass away and look for a way forward to coupe with the new change for Naija.
